key.name: auto-hide
key.summary: Hide the keyboard automatically when not needed
key.description: Florence will hide automatically when no editable widget is selected.

key.name: hide-on-start
key.summary: Hide the keyboard when Florence starts
key.description: Florence will hide the keyboard window just after starting up.

key.name: move-to-widget
key.summary: Move the keyboard to near the selected widget
key.description: Move the keyboard to near the selected editable widget in auto-hide mode. Only useful when auto_hide is activated.

key.name: intermediate-icon
key.summary: Show an intermediate icon before showing the keyboard in auto-hide mode.
key.description: Show an intermediate icon when you click on an editable widget. Click on the icon to show the actual keyboard.

key.name: input-method
key.description: Set the input method. Available input methods are button, timer and ramble.

key.name: timer
key.description: Time, in milliseconds, to wait when the mouse is over a key before the key is automatically pressed (when timer input method is selected)

key.name: ramble-algo
key.description: Set the ramble algorithm used. Valid algorithms are distance and time.

key.name: ramble-threshold1
key.summary: Distance threshold for distance based ramble mode for first key press.
key.description: When ramble input method is selected, this the distance the pointer must move over a key (relative to the size of the key) before the key is pressed

key.name: ramble-threshold2
key.summary: Distance threshold for distance based ramble mode for multiple key presses.
key.description: When ramble input method is selected, this the distance the pointer must move over a key (relative to the size of the key) for pressing a key a second time and more.

key.name: ramble-timer
key.summary: Time threshold for timer based ramble mode.
key.description: Amount of time in milliseconds before the key is automatically pressed.

key.name: ramble-button
key.description: When this option is set, rambling starts on button push. No button is necessary when this option is unset.

key.name: startup-notification
key.description: Display a notification message at startup explaining the basics.

key.name: xpos
key.description: Horizontal position of the keyboard window on the screen (in pixel).

key.name: ypos
key.description: Vertical position of the keyboard window on the screen (in pixel).

key.name: scalex
key.summary: Horizontal scaling factor of the window
key.description: Sets the horizontal size of the window and of the keys

key.name: scaley
key.summary: Vertical scaling factor of the window
key.description: Sets the vertical size of the window and of the keys

key.name: transparent
key.description: To see the windows behind the keyboard.

key.name: decorated
key.description: Window has a title bar and buttons.

key.name: resizable
key.description: The keyboard window can be resized with the mouse.

key.name: keep-ratio
key.summary: Keep window ratio when resizing window.
key.description: The window proportions are kept intact while resizing the window.

key.name: task-bar
key.description: Make Florence appear in the task bar.

key.name: always-on-top
key.description: Keep the keyboard window on top of other windows.

key.name: keep-on-top
key.summary: Bring back the keyboard to top.
key.description: Periodically (each second) bring back the keyboard to top. This is useful for window managers not supporting the always_on_top hint.

key.name: opacity
key.description: Sets the opacity of the keyboard window. Requires window manager compositing to work

key.name: key
key.description: Color of the keys

key.name: outline
key.description: Color of the outline of the keys

key.name: label
key.description: Color of the labels of the keys

key.name: label-outline
key.description: Color of the ouline of the labels. Must contrast with label color for better visibility.

key.name: activated
key.description: Color of the pressed keys

key.name: mouseover
key.description: Color of the key when the mouse is over

key.name: latched
key.description: Color of the latched keys

key.name: ramble
key.description: Color of the ramble path drawn in ramble mode.

key.name: file
key.description: The layout file contains the layout of the keys on the keyboard

key.name: style
key.summary: Path of the layout style file
key.description: The layout style file contains the style to draw the keys of the keyboard

key.name: extensions
key.description: List of keyboard extensions names (colon-separated). extension names must be found in layout file

key.name: focus-zoom
key.summary: scaling factor of the focused key
key.description: scaling factor of the focused key

key.name: sounds
key.description: enable sound feedback when a key is hovered, pressed or released

key.name: system-font
key.description: Set to true to use gtk default font. Set to false to use the style font.

key.name: font
key.description: Font used to display labels on the keyboard
